subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] Nothin'!
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
--_bca00b2b-031d-4acf-a38d-bbd3c5e1d071_
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="iso-8859-1"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable


Welcome Sharon! Personally, I didn't need the proof either, I could alread=
y sense, and sometimes see spirits, and other junk, I'm just intrigued with=
 EVP, and ITC. 
 
 Frank


To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.comFrom: sfe74275@bigpon=
d.net.auDate: Wed, 7 Nov 2007 00:46:30 +1000Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Nothin'!=






Hi,
 
I am a newcomer...but not to the paranormal..I've been hooked a=
s long as I can remember, from feelings of dejavu, to insisting to my paren=
ts that I "saw" their wedding, I now believe i saw this from spirit realms =
(my mom was pregnant with me)....it felt as though I was watching thier uni=
on from an ex emplorary view point (like on widescrean HD, which did not ex=
ist in 1968), I often asked about their "movie" to answers of : I dreamt it=
 etc....but I still remember being child like and asking parent like beings=
: is that my parents?? I don't remeber a reply in words just an "undersatnd=
ing" ...hence lots more has happened, and to cut a long story short my inte=
rest in EVP and proof that we exist before birth and after death......
 
Sh=
arron (Australia)  

----- Original Message ----- 
From: Frank Ratka 
To: E=
VP-ITC@yahoogroups.com 
Sent: Tuesday, November 06, 2007 11:42 PM
Subject: =
Re: [EVP-ITC] Nothin'!




Your right Frank, it all depends on expectations=
 and what degree of proof it will take for someone to accept the existence =
of the beyond and the entities who reside there. People all over the world =
scream for proof but yet if you ask them they cannot define what criteria t=
hey require for proof. Why? Because they are so brainwashed in our societie=
s materialistic teachings they never expect to receive proof, so they don't=
 even bother to define such a criteria.Its amazing to me that a primarily s=
piritual creature such as ourselves can deny our connections with that worl=
d and the source. The connections we experience everyday and at all times i=
n the form of dreams, random thoughts and inspirations are so easily taken =
for granted and written off as figments of imagination, trivial thoughts an=
d meaningless aspirations. Even as a child I knew I was unique as was every=
 person on the face of the planet. I knew that their were as many perspecti=
ves of reality as their were people to have them and that each and every on=
e of them were just as valid as the other no matter how outlandish it seeme=
d to me.Acceptance was taught to me instead of beliefs. Beliefs can enhance=
 the truth but they are not in themselves true.More than I expected to writ=
e but I feel it is still valid,Best regards,Frank R.
----- Original Message=
 ----From: Frank Sumption <franks-boxes@...>To: evp-itc@yahoogroups=
.comSent: Monday, November 5, 2007 1:03:02 PMSubject: RE: [EVP-ITC] Nothin'=
!

 I'm not really discouraged except by other people's expectation, and us=
e of the box. It is all about learning, I don't think we're supposed, or ca=
n, get the proof on this level. I think in my next life I'm going to take j=
ournalism, cuz I certainly can't communicate what my thoughts are.   Frank-=
S
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .comFrom: bulletbabea@ yahoo.comDate: Mon, 5 Nov =
2007 10:05:15 -0800Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Nothin'!



I was too tired to po=
st but I listened to those files last night. I heard the first eq file same=
 as you except one word...monday i heard as tuesday. When you got into slow=
ing it down etc that brought up different multilayers within so I heard som=
e other stuff.
I know how hard it is for you sometimes with what the guys s=
end ya. Thats why ya just have to take it as a grain of salt and use it as =
a learning experience rather than some profound truth being said all the ti=
me.
 
I dont let any of it discourage me, it all interests me instead. I do=
nt get as much deception, but its happened in the past and usually the othe=
rs are quick to point out the deciever and remove them.
 
Misty
 
Frank Sum=
ption <franks-boxes@ hotmail.com> wrote:


This is what troubles me, I get =
these supposed Earthquake predictions, the last one fairly specific, and --=
nothin'! It was supposed to be for China, today. That's what I try to get a=
cross, you can't take this shit like it's written in stone, or some kind of=
 friggin' gospel, as most seem prone to do. So far, irregardless of how cle=
ar the voice is, or what method is used, the only thing that can be said wi=
th certainty is that they consistently lie! Personally I seem to get just e=
nough "truth" to keep me hooked. I don't think you can say with any certain=
ty it's sprits of the deceased, at least not all of it, there's that level =
of deception that I don't kow what do to with. When someone tells me they h=
ave the knowledge to know what questions to ask to verify the personality, =
I have to conclude they are absolutely clueless. I don't care how many book=
s they've written, or how many "universities" they've given. When something=
 knows how you think, what you are perceiving, and how it's being perceived=
, you can't prevent yourself from being deceived, or more like played with.=
 I know I'll be deceived, and tricked, and I tell them have fun with that, =
cuz I don't really care. I'm not after any particular spirit, or piece of k=
nowledge.    When these voices tell someone not to share the information, t=
hat's even thinner ice to on!  I still, everyday, question the value of thi=
s work, and if it warrents continuing. I can do this on my own, but I don't=
 want to drag the unitiated into hell with me! I find the communication mod=
e itself facsinating, and don't expect that profound paranormal knowledge o=
thers seem to seek. I don't care who is talking through the box.  I think t=
hose seeking those bits of profound knowledge, or secrets will get lead rig=
ht down the rabbit hole.   Frank-SPeek-a-boo FREE Tricks Treats for You! Ge=
t 'em!
